name: ZombDash (20 seconds!)
description:
THERE ARE 4 EXITS. YOU MUST BE ON AN EXIT WHEN THE TIMER EXPIRES

This game is so laggy for me and very poorly handled resource wise. Qualifying it for the Bad game Jam.  I started a prototype and abandoned it for my other submission to the 20 second Jam, so im glad I came back to finish another (poor) game.

Play My other, better Catapult game https://skalding.itch.io/20-to

WASD / ARROWS
Movement
SPACE
Dash
MOUSE AND CLICK
Aim and Fire

If you enjoy games and art like this, feel free to follow me for more releases over time!
